snippet.title: Pirofauna - Little Flame Burn! [Reveal Teaser Trailer]
snippet.description:
You are a tiny little Flame.. Burn everything!
Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2984150/Pirofauna

In Pirofauna, you are a tiny little flame wandering through a dark misty forest. You can set fire to anything your tail reaches. Light up the darkness, help lost and frightened worms, dispel unfriendly creatures.

Coming for PC, Mac and later for consoles. Release date TBA

Game by: Tomas Ostafin - Petums
Music by: Tomas Dvorak aka Floex
SFX by: Juraj Mravec
